creator: ps@nomensa.com
text:
Reply from gregor:


> Also, when I upload an image using BXE and insert it, it displays fine. Save
and > exit BXE, load Kupo and there is no image to be found.


images are internally stored as object elements, not img. either kupu can't
handle objects or a transform step is missing. file a bug.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: i asked on the kupu list

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: confirmed. kupu does not support xhtml:object

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: *** Bug 32880 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
i conferred with #kupu, and the best way to solve this is to pre/post process
the object tag to be renderered as img for kupu (and back)

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
this has been fixed. the fix required changes in both lenya and kupu. make sure
to get a svn checkout of the kupu 1.2 branch with at least revision 8795 for
this to work.
